description.en: Then one foggy Christmas Eve, Santa came to say: "Rudolph with your nose so bright, won't you give me buffs tonight?".
description.ar: Then one foggy Christmas Eve, Santa came to say: "Rudolph with your nose so bright, won't you give me buffs tonight?".
description.br: Então, em uma véspera de Natal nebulosa, o Papai Noel vem e diz: "Rudolph com seu nariz tão brilhante, você não vai me dar buffs esta noite?".
description.cns: 一个雾蒙蒙的圣诞夜前夕，圣诞老人走过来说:“鲁道夫，你的鼻子好亮，今晚你不能给我BUFF吗？”。
description.de: Dieser Käfig beinhaltet ein kleines Rentier, dass dir folgt und Gegenstände für dich aufhebt.
description.fi: Then one foggy Christmas Eve, Santa came to say: "Rudolph with your nose so bright, won't you give me buffs tonight?".
description.fil: Then one foggy Christmas Eve, Santa came to say: "Rudolph with your nose so bright, won't you give me buffs tonight?".
description.fr: Un charmant petit renne qui ramasse les objets laissés par les monstres.
description.id: Kemudian pada suatu Malam Natal yang berkabut, Santa datang untuk berkata: "Rudolph kehadiranmu terlihat begitu bersinar, maukah kamu memberiku buff malam ini?".
description.it: Then one foggy Christmas Eve, Santa came to say: "Rudolph with your nose so bright, won't you give me buffs tonight?".
description.jp: ルドルフを召喚・帰還させることができます。あるクリスマスイブの夜、サンタさんがやってきて言いました。「ルドルフ、君の鼻はとても輝いているから、今夜はバフをくれないかい？」
description.kr: 비스를 장착 시 해당 능력치를 캐릭터에게 부여하며, 주변의 아이템을 자동 습득 합니다.
description.nl: Then one foggy Christmas Eve, Santa came to say: "Rudolph with your nose so bright, won't you give me buffs tonight?".
description.pl: Then one foggy Christmas Eve, Santa came to say: "Rudolph with your nose so bright, won't you give me buffs tonight?".
description.ru: Этот зверек-помощник будет послушно ходить за вами и подбирать предметы. Его ошейник можно украсить бусинами, которые повысят ваши характеристики.
description.sp: En una brumosa Nochebuena, Santa vino a decir: "Rudolph, con esa nariz tan brillante, ¿no me darás buffs esta noche?".
description.sw: Then one foggy Christmas Eve, Santa came to say: "Rudolph with your nose so bright, won't you give me buffs tonight?".
description.th: จากนั้นในวันคริสต์มาสอีฟที่มีหมอกหนา ซานต้าก็เข้ามาพูดว่า: "รูดอล์ฟ จมูกของคุณสดใสมาก
description.vi: Rồi vào một đêm Giáng sinh đầy sương mù, ông già Noel đến nói: "Rudolph mũi mày sáng quá, tối nay mày không buff cho tao à?".
